snippet.title: Astro Bears Party - Trailer (Nintendo Switch™)
snippet.description:
Astro Bears™ Party is a competitive party game featuring bears in space suits. It is available on Nintendo Switch™ from September 28th for $4,99.

Astro Bears Party is an easy-to-learn, hard-to-master game about running around a planet and avoiding each other’s Magical Beary Ribbons. Jump and hover over Ribbons using a jetpack. Perform dashes to threaten your opponents. Be the last Bear standing!

Choose one of 4 Bears with different playstyles and battle between 2-4 players. Take a challenge in single player mode and beat your own record in Jetfish Hunting!

Key Features:
- 4 cute Astro Bears with different playstyles
- Local multiplayer for 2-4 players
- Jetfish Hunting single player mode
- Beautiful high quality 3D graphics
- 720p/60fps in undocked and 1080p/60fps in docked mode
- HD Rumble support

Astro Bears is a trademark of QubicGames S.A.. ©2017 QubicGames S.A.
